summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Corporate Work Assistant Phase 1. All backend WebSocket RPC methods working correctly with LLM integration. Frontend QuickTestPanel operational with minor WebSocket connection retry warnings.

design_issues.issue: WebSocket connection retry warnings in console during initial connection attempts

passed_tests: health.get RPC method returns uptime and status
models.list RPC returns OpenAI and Anthropic models with current selection
config.set RPC can switch between openai/gpt-4o and anthropic/claude-sonnet
chat.send RPC with AI response generation (OpenAI/Anthropic LLM integration)
chat.history RPC returns persisted messages from MongoDB
Session isolation - different session_ids have separate message histories
chat.clear RPC clears session messages from MongoDB
Phase 0 backward compatibility - sessions.list, channels.status, activity.recent, gateway.info all working
Frontend QuickTestPanel renders and loads correctly
Frontend chat input accepts text and send button is clickable
Frontend shows 'thinking' status during AI processing
Frontend loads and displays chat history on page mount
Frontend dashboard shows active sessions and real-time activity
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (minor WebSocket warnings only)
